column3: The bus literally just passed me by.
I wanna pop all its tires.
Maybe it didn’t see you ‘cause you’re short...
Bet it’s another big cleanup school time again.
It’s the closing ceremony this Friday.
I don’t even know how to pay taxes yet...
Taxes get taken care of automatically by the government ^^
Our class fund’s gonna be rich at this rate.
And you even act like Hamster!
You look like you stand for absolutely nothing.
..Why do you have a flower on your head?
I have to submit my croquis book next class
I worked so fucking hard on it
Art teacher will let it slide...
He said he’ll buy ice cream for All students!

column2: 이따가 학교 끝나고 햄버거 먹으러 갈까
소드야 로데오 버거는 아닌 거 같다

column3: Should we like end our friendship here?
Guys. Stay Alive. I Wanna die?
I accidentally called my homeroom teacher, f*ck
I freaked out and stepped in a puddle
Oppa. did you already forget me?
I’ve spoiled you so much, remember?
It’s just... free spirited by nature.

column2: 학교에 남아서 같이 볼 존재 구함
